content.rendered:
Packaging is the silent salesperson

Let us work together to make your packaging the best salesperson for your products.

We help you design great packaging solutions

Developing the right packaging is vital for a product’s success. It protects it during transport, acts as a marketing tool, and can have positive environmental effects. Good packaging enhances the product’s perceived value and can justify a higher price. Overall, investing in the development of appropriate packaging is crucial for a product’s success.

Packaging that uses space well
Packaging that is cost-effective
Packaging that enhances product life
Packaging that attracts customers

Why is the right packaging important for you?

Packaging tells the story of your product

Packaging safeguards the product and the brand

Packaging interacts with the customer

Packaging helps you to utilize space

Packaging enhances the life of your product

Packaging earns the money for you

Packaging attracts the customer for you

Packaging is the connecting link between your product and your customer

Packaging helps to maintain the characteristics of your product

We Promise

Cost-efficient Solutions
On-time completion of the project
Establishing good manufacturing processes
Hand-holding from start to finish

What can we do for you?

Designing the best possible solutions

End-to-End Supply Chain Solutions

Helping to become a global TQM compliance company

New Manufacturing plant set-up

Expansion of existing packaging business

Rationalisation of SKU and packaging Material

Supplier audit to improve QCD

Cost-efective and customised automation

Value Engineering

How do we contribute to your growth?

Packaging Materials:
  1. Packaging design and development.  
  2. Selection of the best suitable and economical packaging material.
  3. Sourcing and procurement of printing cylinders and plates.
  4. Testing of packaging materials from a third party.
  5. Logistics arrangements for the supply of packaging materials and the packed goods.
  6. Training the workforce for effortless packing.
  7. Cost efficiency through Value Engineering.
  8. Audit of manufacturing operations based on food safety as per HACCP to abridge any risks and verification of compliance.
  9. Suggestions for improvement in the process and systems and implementation with monitoring of the improvements.
  10. Overall audit of the entire operations and help to upgrade them to the level of Business Excellence. 
Packing Lines:
  1. Sourcing of the right packing line. 
  2. Customization as per the requirement. 
  3. Procurement, installation, and commissioning. 
  4. Operational training with GMP, Food Safety and as per the Global Compliance. 

 

Product Manufacturing:

We help you to start or expand your existing business into the manufacturing of:

  1. Films and bags 
  2. Injection moulded components. 
  3. In-mould labelled products
  4. Blow moulded products
  5. Thermoformed products
  6. Biodegradable Products.
  7. Wooden packaging materials
  8. Metal packaging materials
  9. Metal components
  10. Paper packaging products. 
Audit and Compliance:

For the sustainable growth of your organisation and all the stakeholders, we help you to improvise the practices and processes to the level of business excellence by implementing the world’s renowned, robust but practical systems. 

  1. Food Safety based on HACCP guidelines 
  2. BRC – Operational processes and systems. 
  3. ISO – Operational processes and systems. 
  4. Supplier’s Audit for the improvement in the QCD. 
  5. Time and distance audit to improve efficiency. 
Training:
  1. Operational for GMP
  2. Innovation
  3. Communication
  4. Problem-Solving
  5. Critical thinking
  6. Negotiation
  7. Inventory Management
  8. MIS, Critical and Reorder Level
  9. VMI
  10. VE 
Digital Excellence:

We help in the digitalization or upgradation of the existing digitalization of the following processes: 

  1. Supply Chain Processes. 
  2. Procure to pay 
  3. Inventory management
  4. Sales management
  5. Logistics. 

Meet our Leader

Rajkumar Mathur

Plastipreneur

His 30 years of vast and diversified knowledge in the Design, Development, Manufacturing, and Supply Chain Management of Packaging materials, Packing Machines, Biodegradable Products, Plastics Products, and Waste Management can be helpful to your Esteemed Organization. 

  • ‘The Plastipreneur Mentor’ with Hands-on Knowledge in the Manufacturing Arena of the MNC World. 
  • A Well-Grounded Personality in the Designing and Manufacturing of Packaging Materials, Packing Machines, Biodegradable, Plastics and Recycling 
  • Team Leader and Visionary Business Mentor 
  • Adept In Elevating Organizations’ Productivity, Efficiency and Profitability Through Improvising and Implementing Existing Processes and Systems By The World’s Renowned Robust, Practical, and Easy Systems. 

Lisa carter

Founder- Triple Motive Marketing

He is the most generous coach and mentor I have ever encountered. He is passionate about helping aspiring entrepreneurs and has been instrumental in helping Triple Motive's team to diversify and offer in-depth consulting services. He participates in every aspect of the company and is always wiling to lend a helping hand and encourage others. I would highly recommend Raj to anyone who wants leadership or entrepreneurial coaching or consulting. 

Neha Malviya

Practice Head- InfraBeat Technologies

I have had the pleasure of Knowing Mr. Mathur during a product exploration exercise for Mahyco. I was impressed to see he goes above and beyond in product research and mapping the business requirements, above all he is eager to learn and introduce new technologies in company and ensure the organisation move towards technological enhancement which is a very progressive approach.

Habib Tamboli

Commercial Consultant

Rajkumar Mathur is a reliable & knowledgeable professional who can lead & deliver a cost effective SCM function on end to end basis. a fast learner & adaptive in nature,can fit any industry for that matter...
Given an opportunity he is capable of managing a profit center too... All the very best keep doing the good work.

Shridhar Dhanagare

DGM Vegetable Business Eagle Seeds

I had the pleasure of coordinating with Mathur Saab during my tenure in the Growth Unit and Business Development. Very responsive to the market requirements.  He had created a survey for Packing so as to keep improving the quality.
He has a great sense of humour and a very analytical mind, which helped us in some strategic projects. 

SCHEDULE A CONSULTATION

If you need to know the cost or have any queries, connect for a 1:1 free 30-minute conversation

Schedule
